messages.content:
Fix the editor currently I cannot edit it. Also increase the contrast between the text fields background and the page background, doing a better theme work
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

make the default python code instead of hello world, be something that takes the `emojis = ["üçí", "üçã", "üçâ", "‚≠ê", "üîî", "üçá", "üçä", "üçì"]` and simulates a 3 column slot machine, meaning pick 6 random of these emojis and check the matches of them 2 by two of the same columns, in 1000 trials measure how many
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

the default python code should measure how many times there are 1 matches, 2 matches or 3 matches and prints the final total for each, and print it as a percent % value
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

the default python code does not work saying, KeyError: 0
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Perfect. The only stupid thing about that ptyhon repl that I cannot believe you are so stupid not to have fixed is that the output is all in one line for some reason. \n should be handled corrrect to have a multiline output. For some reason for exceptions it works fine though
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

You fucking bastard, is that really so hard? You replaces the line breaks with spaces but that is not what any sane user would want. It should display in different lines in the output, you are not handling that stdout properly.
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

You havent fixed shit. The output is still not in multiple lines. This makes no sense. This is not so hard.
